1:
Save me, God!
\q Yahweh, come quickly and help me.
\q
2:
Let those who try to take my life
\q be ashamed and humiliated;
\q let them be turned back and brought to dishonor,
\q those who take pleasure in my pain.
\q
3:
Let them be turned back because of their shame,
\q those who say, "Aha, aha."
4:
Let all those who seek you rejoice and be glad in you;
\q let those who love your salvation always say,
\q "May God be praised."
\q
70:
\m
\d For the chief musician. A psalm of David; to bring to remembrance.
\q
